meanings.definition: A Greek island in the Cyclades group in the Aegean Sea.
meanings.sent1: Delos is a beautiful island with rich history.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love to visit Delos during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The locals on Delos always welcome visitors with warm smiles.
meanings.sent4: Exploring Delos feels like stepping back in time.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins on Delos are truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Asphodelaceae.
meanings.sent1: The delos flowers in our garden bloom brightly in spring.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species of delos plants.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the delos blossoms.
meanings.sent4: The delicate petals of the delos flowers dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the delos flowers fills the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A suffix used in taxonomic names to indicate a group of species.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use the term delos to classify specific plant groups.
meanings.sent2: The delos suffix helps in organizing different species.
meanings.sent3: The students learned about the delos group in biology class.
meanings.sent4: The delos label simplifies the identification of plant families.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the delos suffix makes taxonomy easier to grasp.
